Determination: Validates FPIC + EcoAdmissible + RoH monotonicity; allows crossing only if all predicates true
Computes organism-specific density/activity/duration ceilings; blocks swarm if any exceeded
Enforces geographic + temporal fences; revokes if swarm attempts unauthorized approach
Ensures swarms don't displace/harm resident organisms; triggers retreat on stress markers
Allows motion within approved corridors + authorized crossings; denies off-map or FPIC-denied regions
Logs every decision to EvolutionAuditRecord (DID-bound, immutable)
Ensures no swarm activity increases biocompatibility risk or violates rights-of-humanity floor
Computes E_comp (composite margin) to detect macro-scale interference before it harms
